snippet.title: Copperfields Demo Launch - Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Play the Demo on Steam! - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2578740/Copperfields/

Copperfields is a 2D adventure/puzzle platformer, inspired by Limbo and Rain World. Nature has evolved and it’s left you behind. It’s too late to adapt. Run!  Survive in this wild and menacing overgrowth, escape danger, and solve puzzles to reach the promised land.

#indiegame #indie #games #adventureplatformer #adventure #gaming #gameplay #cinematic #trailer #puzzleplatformer #puzzle #puzzlegame #art #story #fantasy
